metadata.title: Earlyseabird Ballet Shoes for Girls Toddlers Practice Shoes Girls Ballet Shoe Yoga Shoes Ballet Slippers Flats for Toddler Kids Dancing
features: 【More durable material】 Ballet shoes uppers are made of wear-resistant and breathable PU material, which is not easy to break and can withstand high-intensity dance movements. Thickened leather soles are non-slip, wear-resistant, not chin, and can reduce noise, allowing you to enjoy dance.
【Lightweight and comfortable】Made of fine cotton, the lining is skin-friendly, moisture wicking, breathable. Lightweight material makes our ballet slippers as light and flexible as socks.

【Wider Elastic Strap】 With a wider elastic strap, the ballet shoes are comfortable and does not strangle your feet. The elastic opening and elastic band can be adjusted to fit the foot. Eliminating the pesky lacing, the elastic band provides a secure fit and easier on and off. It is perfect for dance practice, gymnastics, stage performances and weddings.

【Size Selection】 Before purchasing, please refer to the picture for size recommendations in order to get the right size. Dance shoes need to fit the foot better, so please measure your child's foot length to get the right size and the best wearing comfort. Boys need to order a larger size.

【Easy to clean & after-sales guarantee】Made of pu and leather materials, this ballet shoes will be easier to clean. You can easily clean them with a damp cloth or by using a neutral cleaner. All ballet shoes are carefully inspected and packaged before shipping. If you have any questions during use, please don't hesitate to contact us, we will reply online by email 24 hours a day.
description: Product description: Product name: ballet shoes Upper material: pu Sole material: wear-resistant leather Color: black, white, flesh color Features: Widened elastic band, comfortable and high elasticity, not strangled feet Wear-resistant leather soles, noise reduction, shock absorption, soft and non-slip Breathable PU upper, soft to fit foot, breathable, without foot odor Soft and lightweight, designed according to the curve of the feet, as light and comfortable as socks, does not pinch your feet Dance shoes need to fit the foot better and will be different from the usual size, so please measure your child's foot length and refer to the size recommendations in the picture to get the right size. Maintenance tips 1. Please do not machine wash. 2. You can wipe off the surface stains with a damp cloth. If deep cleaning is required, you can use a soft dry cloth with mild detergent to wipe it.
